title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 326.1 - Basis of requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 326.1 - Basis of requirements

State Regulations

To enable the department to carry out the system of
review entitled "quality control" mandated by the United States Departments of

Agriculture and Health and Human Services, which requires the selection of a
sample of social services district cases for review, each social services
district must comply with the requirements set forth in this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
326.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
